info.brief_description: Load your profile and swap bodies with others. Don't be shy, please add!
info.description:
While you are surfing the web you stumble across a strange side which is advertising bodies…

In this item you can advertise your own body or offer it to the advertisers. Load your profile and swap bodies with other people which are adding to the story.

Rules:
1. At the end of a profile there are always two ways to go: “Offer?” and “Advertise?” If you are advertising your body profile please continue this way.

2. If you are offering your body please end with the choices: “Next offer” and “I’ll take it!”. The advertiser can watch for other offers or start the story now.

3. When you are creating a profile describe your body a bit like physique, body marks and characteristics but don’t overdo it. Please add a picture, too. You can choose if you are posting a picture of your face, body or both of them. Please don’t talk about private things like location and age. (Everybody will be treated like a teenage person!)

4. I really don’t care about what you are writing in the following chapters, but keep it clean and always end with a choice for you and one for the body of the person you swapped with. And PLEASE have fun.

5. Edit: You can work out the kind of the swap together. You can stay at the same position only your body is changing / You can perform a whose life and body swap. Everyone around you will think that’s normal except the person you swapped with and people you tell about it.

6. Make the changes go slow or instantly. That’s up to you.

7. Boy with girl swaps are preferred, but you can swap with anybody that offers you his or her body. (Gay and lesbian stuff is ok, too.)

8. Follow these rules!
Don't be shy, please add!
